transport.question: I have wheels and go beep beep! What am I?

hints.text: 🚗 You see me on the road.
👨‍👩‍👧‍👦 I can carry your family.
🚦 I stop at red lights.

transport.question: I float on the water. What am I?

hints.text: 🌊 I am bigger than a duck.
⚓ I need an anchor to stay still.
💨 I might have a smokestack.

transport.question: I have two wheels and you pedal me. What am I?

hints.text: 🧍 You sit on a seat.
⛑️ You might wear a helmet when riding me.
🔔 I sometimes have a bell.

transport.question: I fly in the sky with big wings. What am I?

hints.text: ☁️ I fly high above the clouds.
✈️ I take people to far away places.
🛬 I land at an airport.

transport.question: I have many seats and take lots of people around. What am I?

hints.text: 🛑 I stop to pick people up.
🗺️ I follow a route.
🎒 You might ride me to school.

transport.question: I go on tracks and carry lots of carriages behind me. What am I?

hints.text: 🚂 I make a 'choo choo' sound.
🛤️ I run on railway tracks.
🚇 I can go underground.

transport.question: I can fly straight up and have a spinning blade on top. What am I?

hints.text: 🚁 I can hover in one spot.
🏥 I can be used to rescue people.
🚨 I am faster than a car.

transport.question: I am a car that helps people in an emergency and has a loud siren. What am I?

hints.text: 🚑 I have a cross symbol.
🚨 I use flashing lights and a siren.
🧑‍⚕️ I take people to the hospital.

transport.question: I am a special vehicle that helps put out fires and has a long hose. What am I?

hints.text: 🚒 I am usually red.
💧 I spray water to stop fires.
👨‍🚒 Firefighters use me.

transport.question: I travel to space and am very fast, blasting off with a loud roar. What am I?

hints.text: 🚀 I fly very, very high.
👩‍🚀 Astronauts ride inside me.
🪐 I visit the moon and the planets.

plant.question: I am green and grow in the ground. Cows like to eat me. What am I?

hints.text: 🌱 I am short and cover the field.
🐄 Animals eat me to get big and strong.
⚽ You can play on me.

plant.question: I am a big plant with a thick trunk and leaves. Birds like to build nests in me. What am I?

hints.text: 🌳 I am very tall.
🐿️ Squirrels like to climb me.
🍃 I lose my leaves in the fall.

plant.question: I am colorful and smell sweet. Bees love to visit me. What am I?

hints.text: 🌷 I grow in a garden.
🐝 Bees make honey with my help.
💐 You can give me to someone you love.

plant.question: I grow underground, and I'm good to eat. Bunnies like to eat me. What am I?

hints.text: 🥕 I am orange.
🐰 Rabbits love to munch on me.
🥣 I can be cooked in soup.

plant.question: I have thorns and beautiful flowers. I am a symbol of love. What am I?

hints.text: 🌹 I am often red.
🌵 Be careful of my pointy bits.
💘 People give me on Valentine's Day.

plant.question: I am long and green and grow on a vine. You can make pickles out of me. What am I?

hints.text: 🥒 I can be sour or sweet.
☀️ I need lots of sunshine to grow.
🥪 You can slice me and put me on a sandwich.

plant.question: I am a big, round fruit that is red inside and has lots of black seeds. What am I?

hints.text: 🍉 I am a summer treat.
🌱 I grow on vines and am very big.
🥤 You can make juice out of me.

plant.question: I have a trunk and branches, but I cry when you cut me down. What am I?

hints.text: 🍁 I'm used to make paper.
💧 My sap is used to make maple syrup.
🏠 You can build a house with me.

plant.question: I'm a seed that pops when it's hot. You can eat me at the movies. What am I?

hints.text: 🌽 I come from a tall plant.
🍿 I'm white and fluffy when cooked.
🎬 People like to eat me while watching movies.

plant.question: I'm a long, thin plant that climbs and twists. I can be used to hang Tarzan in the jungle. What am I?

hints.text: 🐒 Monkeys like to swing on me.
🌿 I grow in tropical rainforests.
🌴 I hang from trees.
